library(knitr)
install.packages("kableExtra")
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(eeptools)

fipa <- readRDS('K:/Data/2015-2016/PA24/FIPA_PA24.rds')

# FIPA_PA24

```{r results='asis'}

fipa <- fipa %>% 
 mutate(DatNaiss = as.Date(DatNaiss),
        age = age_calc(DatNaiss, 
                      enddate = as.Date('2015-04-01'), 
                      units = "years", precise = F)) %>%
  arrange(BenBanls,Sexe) %>%
  count(Sexe, age) %>%
  group_by(Sexe)




as.character(as.Date("2015-04-01")) - as.numeric(as.Date(DatNaiss)) / 365
# Calcul de l'age

fipa["age"]<-age_calc(fipa$DatNaiss, 
                      enddate = as.Date('2015-04-01'), 
                      units = "years", precise = F)

# CatÃ©gorisation par groupe d'age. Excluant les valeurs de droite

catage<-c(0,65,70,75,80,85,90,95,100,105,110)

fipa["Groupe d'age"]<- cut(fipa$age, breaks = catage, right = FALSE)

  

tabage<-as.data.frame(table(fipa$`Groupe d'age`))

colnames(tabage)<-c("Groupe d'age","Nbr")

knitr::kable(tabage, format = 'latex' )

```
